#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
typedef long long ll;
const int N = 5005;
int a[N];
int main() {
    int n;
    scanf("%d", &n);
    for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {
        scanf("%d", &a[i]);
    }
    ll ans = 1e18;
    for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {
        ll prev = 0;
        ll cnt = 0;
        for (int j = i - 1; j >= 0; j--) {
            prev = prev / a[j] * a[j];
            if (prev >= -a[j]) {
                prev = -a[j];
            }
            while (prev >= 0) {
                prev -= a[j];
                cnt++;
            }
            // In this solution, they are setting the value to prev (negative) and counting the moves.
        }
        prev = 0;
        for (int j = i+1; j < n; j++) {
            prev = prev / a[j] * a[j];
            if (prev <= a[j]) {
                prev = a[j];
            }
            while (prev <= 0) {
                prev += a[j];
                cnt++;
            }
        }
        ans = min(ans, cnt);
    }
    cout << ans << endl;
}
